channel.title: Do I have to change this?

item.title: Do I have to change this?
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

java.net.ServerSocket(); clientListener.bind(new java.net.InetSocketAddress(java.net.InetAddress.getByName("0.0.0.0"), serverlistenerPort),250);

Do I have to change the “0.0.0.0” in order for the server to be running on my ip? Because I think its still running on 127.0.0.1…

Read full topic
item.source: Do I have to change this?
